description:
This instrumentation does not emit any telemetry on its own. Instead, it captures enduser attributes, and is only enabled when at least one of the `enduser` configurations is enabled.
NOTE: The `enduser` attributes have been deprecated and will be removed in 3.0+ of the java agent.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.spring-security.enduser.role.granted-authority-prefix
configurations.description: Prefix of granted authorities identifying roles to capture in the `enduser.role` semantic attribute.

configurations.name: otel.instrumentation.spring-security.scope.role.granted-authority-prefix
configurations.description: Prefix of granted authorities identifying scopes to capture in the `enduser.scopes` semantic attribute.
